definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: You could write an equation for a process that you could actually solve.
sentences.chinese: 你写出一个关于进程的方程式能求解。

sentences.english: And what he does is writes this equation here.
sentences.chinese: 他所做的就是写这些下方程式。

sentences.english: The max number of iterations to do when solving.
sentences.chinese: 运用高斯赛德尔迭代法的约束方程式求解器。

sentences.english: A huge amount of experimental data is synthesized to establish a dimensionless number equation for intensified boiling heat transfer.
sentences.chinese: 并综合大量实验数据建立强化沸腾传热准数方程式。

sentences.english: One side of an equation must balance the other.
sentences.chinese: 方程式的一边必须和另一边相等。

sentences.english: Polynomials, including relationships involving the roots of quadratic and cubic equations, the remainder theorem.
sentences.chinese: 多项式，包括二次求根，三次方程式，余部定理。

sentences.english: Equational Programming Language (EP) is a novel intelligence language.
sentences.chinese: 方程式语言是一种新型智能语言。

sentences.english: This paper is to study how the lengths of foundation piles influencing driven piles by one dimensional wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 应用一维波波动方程式探讨基桩长度对打击桩的影响。

sentences.english: Thebalance equation of power driven disc plow is built.
sentences.chinese: 建立了旱田驱动圆盘犁机组的平衡方程式。

sentences.english: You may use a non-programmable calculator.
sentences.chinese: 可使用没有设定方程式的计算机。

sentences.english: Application example of formula for determining pipe diameter by resistance control method has been listed.
sentences.chinese: 列举了用阻力控制法确定管径方程式的应用实例。

sentences.english: So I have got these equations which explain how gravity works.
sentences.chinese: 这样我才能得出解释万有引力是如何运作的方程式。

sentences.english: Equations for polarization curve and the height of hysteric ring were derived and examined.
sentences.chinese: 推导并验证了极化曲线和滞后圈高度的方程式。

sentences.english: Based on the sub-region generalized variational principle, the solving equations of the problem are derived directly.
sentences.chinese: 根据分区广义变分原理，直接导出问题的求解方程式。

sentences.english: I am going to show the equation, but I don't expect you to solve it.
sentences.chinese: 我将给出这个方程式，但我不期望你可以得出解。

sentences.english: The equations of motion of these systems are also derived to verify their nonlinearities.
sentences.chinese: 本研究也推导了这些系统运动方程式以验证其非线性。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
